channel.title: Simple question, please help (start up error)
channel.description: hey, well, i am having trouble with my client(obviously) :P. When i start the client, it will bring up the command prompt and then the screen, but it won't load, it freezes :confused:. on the command prompt, it says "error_game_js5connect"....what the hell does that mean? lol, and how do i fix it? what is causing it? :confused: Any help would be great, but please don't be a smart ass or put my down...many ppl like to act cool or some stuff and say something smart...lol, well anyway, thanks for taking time 2 read my post.

item.title: Simple question, please help (start up error)

item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

fixed it. thanks ppplz

item.source: Simple question, please help (start up error)

item.title: Simple question, please help (start up error)
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

Kozy:

[quote]“error_game_js5connect”

It gets an error, when connecting to the server. Make sure you have client.java going to 127.0.0.1, or whatever your IP address is, and have the server running also. Also make sure your using the right client version lmao.[/quote]
it’s a client with ip changer, and in the box where it asks for ip, i put in 127.0.0.1…still, nothin…

Read full topic

item.title: Simple question, please help (start up error)
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

"error_game_js5connect"
It gets an error, when connecting to the server. Make sure you have client.java going to 127.0.0.1, or whatever your IP address is, and have the server running also. Also make sure your using the right client version lmao.[code][/code]

item.title: Simple question, please help (start up error)
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

noobs are ftw:

if its your server ur trying to connect to then u gotta portfoward

what the hell are you talking about…i don’t need to portforward cuz i never have in my life and it’s always worked…wait, what the hell are you talking about anyway? that does not even make sense…lol, how would i need to portforward? that’s for others trying to connect. i am connecting to my server…on my computer, which is exactly why i would not need to portforward, lol. idiot
